text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK Test_DynModel_Scara2_Z
VAR
	m_dynModel : DynModel_Scara2_Z;
END_VAR
VAR CONSTANT
	/// Frame of the initial robot position.
	ZERO_TCP_FRAME : SM3M.SMC_Frame := (
        mR:= (
            aElems:= [
                1, 0, 0,
                0, 1, 0,
                0, 0, 1]),
        vT:= (
			dX:= m_dynModel.armOneLength + m_dynModel.armTwoLength,
			dY:= 0,
			dZ:= - m_dynModel.baseHeight - m_dynModel.armOneHeight - m_dynModel.zAxisOffset));
END_VAR

title: Robotics_DynamicModel-Help_functions\Test_DynModel_Scara2_Z_CheckScrewAxis.st
Robotics_DynamicModel-Help_functions\Test_DynModel_Scara2_Z_CheckScrewAxis.st
Robotics_DynamicModel-Help_functions\Test_DynModel_Scara2_Z_CheckScrewAxis.st
Robotics_DynamicModel-Help_functions\Test_DynModel_Scara2_Z_CheckScrewAxis.st
Robotics_DynamicModel-Help_functions\Test_DynModel_Scara2_Z_CheckScrewAxis.st
text:
METHOD CheckScrewAxis : BOOL
VAR
	state : INT;
	done : BOOL;
	error : BOOL;
	
	axisPos : TRAFO.AXISPOS_REF;
END_VAR
VAR CONSTANT
	EPS : LREAL := 1E-10;
END_VAR

m_dynModel.Init();

WHILE NOT done AND NOT error DO
	CASE state OF
		0:
			axisPos.a0 := 0;	/// []
			axisPos.a1 := 0;	/// []
			axisPos.a2 := 0;	/// [m]
			
			IF IsScrewAxisAndKinematicEqual(axisPos, EPS) THEN
				state := state + 10;
			ELSE
				error := TRUE;
			END_IF
		
		10:
			axisPos.a0 := 0;	/// []
			axisPos.a1 := 90;	/// []
			axisPos.a2 := 0.03;	/// [m]
			
			IF IsScrewAxisAndKinematicEqual(axisPos, EPS) THEN
				state := state + 10;
			ELSE
				error := TRUE;
			END_IF
		
		20:
			axisPos.a0 := 45;	/// []
			axisPos.a1 := -50;	/// []
			axisPos.a2 := -0.01;/// [m]
			
			IF IsScrewAxisAndKinematicEqual(axisPos, EPS) THEN
				state := state + 10;

		30:

title: Robotics_DynamicModel-Help_functions\Test_DynModel_Scara2_Z_CheckScrewAxis.st
text:
axisPos : TRAFO.AXISPOS_REF;
END_VAR
VAR CONSTANT
	EPS : LREAL := 1E-10;
END_VAR

m_dynModel.Init();

WHILE NOT done AND NOT error DO
	CASE state OF
		0:
			axisPos.a0 := 0;	/// []
			axisPos.a1 := 0;	/// []
			axisPos.a2 := 0;	/// [m]
			
			IF IsScrewAxisAndKinematicEqual(axisPos, EPS) THEN
				state := state + 10;
			ELSE
				error := TRUE;
			END_IF
		
		10:
			axisPos.a0 := 0;	/// []
			axisPos.a1 := 90;	/// []
			axisPos.a2 := 0.03;	/// [m]
			
			IF IsScrewAxisAndKinematicEqual(axisPos, EPS) THEN
				state := state + 10;
			ELSE
				error := TRUE;
			END_IF
		
		20:
			axisPos.a0 := 45;	/// []
			axisPos.a1 := -50;	/// []
			axisPos.a2 := -0.01;/// [m]
			
			IF IsScrewAxisAndKinematicEqual(axisPos, EPS) THEN
				state := state + 10;
			ELSE
				error := TRUE;
			END_IF
		
		30:
			done := TRUE;
	END_CASE
END_WHILE

CheckScrewAxis := done AND NOT error;

text:
{attribute 'strict'}
TYPE TorqueLimitationDemoStates :
(
	PowerAxisGroup,
	InitializeDynamicModel,
	InitializeTestMovement,
	InitializeUnlimitedTorqueMovement,
	ExecuteUnlimitedTorqueMovement,
	InitializeLimitedTorqueMovement,
	ExecuteLimitedTorqueMovement,
	InitializeMovementWithLoad,
	ExecuteMovementWithLoad,
	FinalizeTestMovement,
	DemoFinished
);
END_TYPE
